Description.Name: Gunnery
Description.Details: Gunnery determines the chance to hit with ranged weaponry. Higher skill is an effective counter to Evasion and environmental effects that hamper targeting.

temporalSetResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Gunnery], Gunnery]] set to {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Gunnery], Gunnery]] increased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Gunnery], Gunnery]] decreased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
